Class dom.session.GroupAdmissionCheck 

java.lang.Object
    |
    +----dom.session.GroupAdmissionCheck
class GroupAdmissionCheck
extends java.lang.Object
A check of a group admission request. Instances of this class are created by the View to pass around all of the information compactly that is needed to accomplish a group admission check.

Author:
Scott Lewis
See Also:
checkForAdmission, handleLeaveMsg
Source Code:
GroupAdmissionCheck.java

data - any data associated with result, that should be propogated back to the requester
